timeline.message:
[WFLY-13392] WFSM000001: Permission check failed ... FilePermission when Security Manager enabled and Web App tries to forward to jsp

The issue was fixed by upgrading undertow to 2.1.1.Final (https://issues.redhat.com/browse/UNDERTOW-1703)

This is the test for WFLY-13392
